name: For Ravious
requirement: Find Ravious's lost rats around Lion's Arch.

bits.text: Find the lost rat in the Farshore Ward.
Find the lost rat in the Bloodcoast Ward.
Find the lost rat in Sanctum Harbor.
Find the lost rat in the Western Ward.
Find the lost rat in Commodore's Quarter.
Find the lost rat in the Trader's Forum.
Find the lost rat in the Grand Piazza.
Find the lost rat in the Eastern Ward.
Find the lost rat in the Postern Ward.
Return to Ravious in Hooligan's Route after finding all of his missing rats.
You spoke to Ravious and accepted his request to find his nine missing rats.
